title: Polished Quartz or Granite Countertops, European-Style Cabinetry
posting_body: Welcome Home to Candara at Hancock Park Apartments

From our prestigious location in one of Los Angeles’ most sought-after neighborhoods down to multi-step water filtration system, every detail at Candara at Hancock Park has been carefully curated to let you want for nothing.
Each home offers unparalleled amenities to provide the comforts and conveniences that will elevate your daily life.
A stunning community with exceptional features, Candara Apartments is an opulent yet serene backdrop for the memories you’ll create here.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
